content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 4, Burnley 1.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 4, Burnley 1.
Offside, Burnley. Ashley Barnes tries a through ball, but Sam Vokes is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Ben Mee (Burnley) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Matthew Lowton.
Jonathan Walters (Burnley) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Danilo (Manchester City).
Attempt blocked. Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne.
Corner,  Burnley. Conceded by Fernandinho.
Goal!  Manchester City 4, Burnley 1. Bernardo Silva (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Leroy Sané following a fast break.
Offside, Manchester City. Danilo tries a through ball, but Raheem Sterling is caught offside.
Substitution, Manchester City. Bernardo Silva replaces Sergio Agüero.
Offside, Manchester City. Kyle Walker tries a through ball, but Raheem Sterling is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Sam Vokes (Burnley) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Jeff Hendrick with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Burnley. Conceded by Kyle Walker.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Manchester City. Kevin De Bruyne replaces Ilkay Gündogan.
Substitution, Burnley. Jonathan Walters replaces Johann Berg Gudmundsson.
Delay in match Jeff Hendrick (Burnley) because of an injury.
Attempt blocked. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Fernandinho with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Kevin Long (Burnley) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Johann Berg Gudmundsson with a cross.
Corner,  Burnley. Conceded by John Stones.
Attempt blocked. Ashley Westwood (Burnley) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Substitution, Manchester City. Kyle Walker replaces Oleksandr Zinchenko.
Goal!  Manchester City 3, Burnley 1. Leroy Sané (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by David Silva with a through ball.
Substitution, Burnley. Nahki Wells replaces Jack Cork.
Jack Cork (Burnley) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Jack Cork (Burnley).

Ashley Westwood (Burnley) is shown the yellow card.
